scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:drop && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:create && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all && NODE_ENV=test BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5000 PORT=5000 nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --exit && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:drop
scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:init: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
